DOC.brief_summary: This prospective, randomize, controlled trial will compared maximal to half-maximal suction pressure applied during water exchange in patients undergoing minimally sedated colonoscopy. We test the hypothesis that maximal suction pressure is more efficient and causes shorter insertion time.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Maximal and Half-maximal Suction Pressure Applied During Water Exchange in Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing minimally sedated colonoscopy performed by YHH known history of obstructive lesions of the colon, allergy to meperidine, massive ascites, past history of partial colectomy, or refusal to provide written informed consent.
